body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Peter Williams and I'm a customer service representative at Elite Automobiles. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Carolyn Patterson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Carolyn. Can you please provide me with your phone number? Please spell out the digits as we input them that way.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's four five six, two three one, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carolyn. And, may I have your email address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's C A R O L Y N dot P A T T E R S O N at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Carolyn. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out to us, Carolyn. If you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
